description: Explore how Gitcoin Kudos, digital badges as non-fungible tokens, enhance the open source community by recognizing contributions, fostering collaboration, and providing visibility for developers. Learn about their structure, impact, success stories, and future potential.
keywords: Gitcoin, Gitcoin Kudos, open source, digital badges, NFTs, community engagement, blockchain, Ethereum, collaboration, professional networking
title: Exploring Gitcoin Kudos: Strengthening the Open Source Community
